channel.title: Weird background in a drum kit sample
channel.description: Hello I was working on a track and came across some unusual background noises from the sample impact titled “Need For Speed” from LEVIATHAN 2’s sample pack. https://app.auxy.co/projects/z87S6QYnab2bZFv-bAiSQA== It sounds like some kind of tape recorder or something like that. Does anyone know what it is?

item.title: Weird background in a drum kit sample
item.dc:creator: BHR
item.description:
Hello
I was working on a track and came across some unusual background noises from the sample impact titled “Need For Speed” from LEVIATHAN 2’s sample pack.
https://app.auxy.co/projects/z87S6QYnab2bZFv-bAiSQA==
It sounds like some kind of tape recorder or something like that.
Does anyone know what it is?

Read full topic
item.source: Weird background in a drum kit sample
